mean_en: having or showing the proud and unpleasant attitude of someone who gives orders and expects other people to obey them
word_etyma: imper统治，指挥 + ious形容词后缀 → 统治严厉的 → imperious 专横的
sentence: "You must all listen to me," the man said in an imperious manner.
sentence_trans: “你们都得听我的。”这个男人态度专横地说。
